question: 責任感
sourceMnemonic: <ja>責任</ja> is <kanji>responsibility</kanji>. If you add <ja>感</ja> you get a "feeling of responsibility." That's not really a thing people say. What people do say, however, is <vocabulary>sense of responsibility</vocabulary>. Do you have one?
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
